casebody.data:
Bernard M. SHOTKIN v. H. P. BURKE, as Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Colorado, et al. No. 3754. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Oct. 20, 1948. Writ of Certiorari Denied Dee. 6,1948. See 69 S.Ct. 231. Bernard M. Shotkin, pro se. Henry McAllister, of Denver, Colo., for appellees.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and MURRAH, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed, on ground that the lower court was without jurisdiction to entertain the suit.
